ca.projectTOMi.tomi.service

Class EntryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.service.EntryService

  • @Service
public class EntryService
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides services for Entry and Timesheet objects.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Iliya Kiritchkov, Karol Talbot

    • Method Detail

      • updateEntry

        public Entry updateEntry(java.lang.Long id,
                         Entry updatedEntry)
        Updates the Entry with the provided id with the provided attributes. If the updated Entry has a Status of APPROVED or SUBMITTED, an IllegalEntryStateException will be raised as these statuses do not allow any modification of the contents of an Entry object.

        If the updated Entry has a Status of LOGGING, the existing Entry will be updated to contain the updated attributes.

        If the updated Entry has a Status of REJECTED, a new Entry object will be created with identical content to the rejected Entry and it will be saved with an Active status of false. The existing Entry Status will be set to LOGGING.

        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the Entry to update.
        updatedEntry - Entry object containing the updated attributes.
        Returns:
        Entry containing the updated attributes.

      • getEntry

        public Entry getEntry(java.lang.Long id)
        Gets a Entry object with the provided id.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the Entry to find.
        Returns:
        Entry object matching the provided id.

      • saveEntry

        public Entry saveEntry(Entry entry)
        Persists the provided Entry and sets its Status to LOGGING.
        Parameters:
        entry - Entry to be persisted.
        Returns:
        Entry that was persisted.

      • deleteEntry

        public void deleteEntry(java.lang.Long id)
        Deletes an Entry object. The delete action is based on the current Status of the Entry. If the status is LOGGING then the Entry will be physically deleted from the database, otherwise, the Entry active field will be set to false.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the Entry to be deleted.

        userAccount - The account of the user
        Returns:
        if the account was created successfully

      • submitTimesheet

        public Timesheet submitTimesheet(java.lang.Long id)

      • evaluateTimesheet

        private void evaluateTimesheet(java.lang.Long id)
        Evaluates the Status of the timesheet with the provided id. If all Entrys are approved the timesheet is given the approved status. If all entries are approved or rejected the timesheet is given the rejected status. Otherwise, it's status remains unchanged.
        Parameters:
        id - the unique identifier for the timesheet
